me lipiya kiri sappaya kiya podi ekekugeya...dula mama athe ewami,   me dawas tikema si lankawe ayata bona jathi sambandayen albuda athi unaya.sathiyakata withara uda di sara bima wala ganan wadi karala kiya ape loku mama kagahuwa mathakaya.eeka nam kamak natha kiya siya kiweya.eeta passe pirisidu wathura illuwata rathupaswala mamala nandala kattiyakata hamudawe mamala wedi thibbeya.wathura illuwama wedi thiyanne mokada kila mata therenne natha.samaharawita eeka manusika meheyum jathiyak wennathiya.monawa wunath dan chanal 4 eke ewunta raja magulluya.eeta passe dan api bona kukku piti eketh wasaluya.siya rata de siri sapa de kalaye kili piti gannata polime yannata wunaluya.siya kiyanne ehemaya.dan ehema bambuwak nathiya.aasiyawe aascharyaya kalaye siddha wenne waha piti bonnataya.waha piti enne pontera samagamenluya.kohomath eeken dena pidiyapro ape amma mata denna hadana kota man ee dawas walama epa kiwwemiya.eewa biwwama api gobba hipatu mahama maha amu mattan bawata path wenawaya.andume kalu pata irak thawarunama mulu andumema ee jarawa thawaragena andumama nasthi karaganna gobba patiyeku wimata mata uwamanawak nathiya.man hithanne eeka oya thiyenawa kiyana wisa wala prathipalayakya.monawa unath eeye peleda ooka gana liyapu sapiro nonata nam pontera samagama hari lokuya.eyata eewaye gunak agunak gana wadak nathiluya.pontera samagama gana si lankawe madhya hariyata wartha nokarapu eka thamayiluya eyata wadagath wanne.eya kiyana bambuwa kiri sappayata nam  therenne natha.samahara wita man podi nisa wennathiya.monawa wunath dan kadawal walin  yogat kaddith ,kukku pakat boddith api kattiya peresam wennata oonaya.ee kukku pakat wadi hariyakuth ,gewal wala hadana yogatuth  hadanne piti kiri walin nisaya.eewa pontera piti wiya hakiya.me dawas wala blog awakashayeth hari hari wada wenneya.sam mamage  "rata kello - kollo katha karana eewa" lipiyata wechchi  deyak nathiya.oya athale ape kenji mamata anolagen kaladalaya.pala athi rukatamane hena gahanne ganan nogena hitiyanam hariya.mama adata nawathimi.mita, kiri sappaya( dula mama athe ewami )  sa:yu :- mehi sandahan siyaluma adahas kiri sappayage wana athara dula eeta waga nokiyanneya.
